gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency
Interface IOverlay

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationOverlay, AxisOverlay2D, LegendOverlay, MarkerOverlay, OverlayJPanel, SelectionOverlay, TranslationOverlay
public interface IOverlay

This interface lays out methods to be implemented by all view component overlays.

Method Summary
 void getFocus()
          This method will give the focus of the overlay.
 void repaint()
          This method repaints the overlay.
 

Method Detail

repaint

void repaint()
This method repaints the overlay. In most instances, this method will be implemented by the OverlayJPanel via the JPanel implementation.

getFocus

void getFocus()
This method will give the focus of the overlay. In many cases the overlay will need one of it's private data members to be granted window focus. getFocus() will allow the overlay to specify focus by using requestFocus() within this method.
